### Number 2

```{r}

query<-"SELECT salary,yearID 
FROM Salaries
GROUP BY salary
HAVING avg(salary)>100000
ORDER BY avg(salary)"

result<-sqldf(query)

-------
  
ggplot()+
  geom_point(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=salary))+
  geom_line(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=salary))+
  ggtitle("Salary by year")

```
